trans-unit.source: Implements a type converter for <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref> objects, which deliberately have no type conversion pathways.
trans-unit.target: Implementeert een type-conversieprogramma voor <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"> </xref> -objecten, die opzettelijk geen type conversie paden hebben.

trans-unit.source: The type converter enforces and reports that behavior.
trans-unit.target: De type-conversieprogramma worden afgedwongen en rapporteert dat gedrag.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>type moet een type converter pad niet gebruiken om waarden te converteren.</xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>

trans-unit.source: You should use markup extensions instead.
trans-unit.target: In plaats daarvan moet u opmaakextensies gebruiken.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Daarom moet de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>methoden altijd retourneren `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>methoden altijd Veroorzaak een exception.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: The exceptions might possibly report invalid input, but even input that is considered valid will result in <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: De uitzonderingen kunnen mogelijk worden gerapporteerd is ongeldig, maar zelfs invoer die als geldig beschouwd leidt ertoe dat <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: ## XAML tekst gebruik

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt bepaald of een object van het opgegeven type kan worden geconverteerd naar een exemplaar van <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"> </xref>, met behulp van de opgegeven context.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retourneert altijd <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>type moet een type converter pad niet gebruiken om waarden (gebruik opmaakextensies in plaats daarvan) te converteren.</xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the CanConvertFrom and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Daarom moet de CanConvertFrom en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>methoden altijd retourneren `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>methoden altijd Veroorzaak een exception.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: De context van een indeling die informatie biedt over de omgeving waarin deze converter wordt aangeroepen.

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: Het type dat wordt geëvalueerd voor conversie.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in alle gevallen.

trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt bepaald of een exemplaar van <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"> </xref> kan worden geconverteerd naar het opgegeven type, met behulp van de opgegeven context.

trans-unit.target: Retourneert altijd <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and CanConvertTo methods always return `false`.

trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>methoden altijd Veroorzaak een exception.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>
